articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: American Airlines' frequent flyer program is changing. Here’s what you need to know - CNBC
articles.description: American made a host of changes to its lucrative frequent flyer program to encourage travelers to sign up.
articles.content:
First things first: American Airlines isn't changing the requirements to earn elite status at the airline in the coming earning year.
Those thresholds are typically top of mind for frequent flyers a… [+2878 chars]
